728377f-a.title: Richmond: Arthur Kill Road - Winant Avenue
728377f-a.text:
2571 Arthur Kill Road, north side, at the head
of Winant Avenue, showing the Golder House, seen
across part of Rossville Cemetery. The maps of
1874 and 1898 show the house to have been owned by
Dr. R. H. Golder.
March 16, 1925
By Wm. T. Davis through P. L. Sperr
NO REPRODUCTIONS
(2)
A front view of the Golder House, across Arthur
Kil1 Road.
April 30, 1929
P. L. Sperr
NO REPRODUCTIONS
728377f-a.folder: Arthur Kill Road & Winant Avenue, Staten Island, NY

728461f-a.title: Richmond: Arthur Kill Road - Winant Place
728461f-a.text:
Arthur Kill Road, east side, at Winant Place, showing
the Charleston Station of the United States Post Office.
September 23, 1927
P. L. Sperr
NO RE7RODUCTIONS
728461f-a.folder: Arthur Kill Road & Winant Place, Staten Island, NY

729925f-a.title: Richmond: Winant Place - Arthur Kill Road
729925f-a.text:
Winant Place, adjoining the N. E. corner of Arthur
Eill Road (Charleston), showing St. Peter's Evangelical
Lutheran Church.
September 23, 1927
P. L. Sperr
NO REPRODUCTIONS
729925f-a.folder: Winant Place & Arthur Kill Road, Staten Island, NY

728376f-a.title: Richmond: Arthur Kill Road - Winant Avenue
728376f-a.text:
2556 (right) and 2546 Arthur Kill Road, at, and
adjoining the S.E. corner of Winant Avenue. The
corner house is the iehlmeyer store.
April 30, 1929
P. L. Sperr
NO REPRODUCTIONS
728376f-a.folder: Arthur Kill Road & Winant Avenue, Staten Island, NY

728378f-a.title: Richmond: Arthur Kill Road - Winant Avenue
728378f-a.text:
2591 Arthur Kill Road, north side, adjoining
(to the west) Winant Avenue. This house belonged to
D. C. La Forge (1898) and earlier (1874) to C. Cole.
Dates refer to maps on which the owners' names appear.
April 30, 1929
P. L. Sperr
NO REPRODUCTIONS
728378f-a.folder: Arthur Kill Road & Winant Avenue, Staten Island, NY

728459f-b.title: Richmond: Arthur Kill Road - Winant Avenue
728459f-b.text:
Arthur Kill Road, north side, at the head of
Winant Avenue, showing the Mary Cole house. It
stands about 175 yards back of the road (in rear
of No. 2571) near the shore of Arthur Kill.
April 30, 1929
P. L. Sperr
NO REPRODUCTIONS
(2)
Part of the Cole property, viewing toward
Arthur Kill.
April 30, 1929
P. L. Sperr
NO REPRODUCTIONS
728459f-b.folder: Arthur Kill Road & Winant Avenue, Staten Island, NY
